amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit a report on the efforts of the Secretary to review and implement staffing models at the Department of Veterans Affairs that will ensure timely, high quality delivery of health care, benefits, and other services furnished by the Department.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3413 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3413 proposed by Senator Tuberville to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3413 proposed by Senator Tuberville to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3413 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
